title: Looking for Top or ADC Main
body:
-Semi serious team
-Teamspeak 3
-Must be open to constructive criticism
-Not be a rager lel

replies.body: Add me for top main, IGN is Frankium
add me for adc IGN is TBL Creamie
FilAmOzNoob added you dude! He's my mate, he's more or less the one in charge. You free to play some games tomorrow dude? :)
